w:r.w:t: Lightweight Mobile Expense & Cash Book Tracking App

This document outlines the development plan for a lightweight mobile application designed for personal and business expense tracking, inspired by the simplicity and efficiency of Cash Book and Bildify apps. The application aims to provide a minimal, clutter-free interface for managing cash flow, daily transactions, and financial insights without compromising on core functionality.

Create a fast, offline-capable, lightweight expense tracking application that empowers individuals and small business owners to manage their finances efficiently through an intuitive interface with minimal resource consumption.

The expense tracking app market shows strong growth with apps like Cash Book achieving 350,000+ downloads and 4.5-star ratings. Users consistently prioritize simplicity, offline functionality, and lightweight design over feature-rich solutions[2].

For small developers, construction site managers, and contractors, tracking daily employee attendance and calculating weekly wages with advance deductions is critical. This module integrates seamlessly with the core expense tracking system, converting employee attendance records and advances into automated wage payments that feed into the main cash ledger.

Developer has 5–15 workers. Each day, mark who came to work (Present/Absent/Half day). Track advance amounts given during the week. On Saturday, calculate each employee's gross wage, deduct advances, and show net payable. One click marks wages paid and records transaction in cash book.
